name: Offal Walker
description: The Offal Walker has a horror-inducing appearance, showcasing a grotesque form commonly associated with necromantic evils. It utilizes unique gut lassos as both grappling tools and obstacles, embodying a relentless and sinister style in combat.
memorable: Its ability to maintain multiple gut lassos simultaneously makes it a unique grappler, while its undying nature poses a constant threat to foes.
goals: To hinder and bind its enemies through relentless grappling and control tactics.
relations: Often found in the service of necromancers or other dark entities, it may work alongside other undead creatures.
environment: Typically found in dark, forsaken places, or places plagued by necromantic energies.
strengths: Decent durability and the ability to grapple and restrain multiple foes.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma indicate poor mental capabilities; vulnerable to abilities targeting low saving throws.
attacks: The Offal Walker uses gut lassos to grapple and restrain foes, dealing bludgeoning damage while pulling them closer to amplify its control.
most_powerful_ability: Gut Lassos allow for maintaining multiple grappling tools at once, making it a uniquely dangerous foe.
senses: Possesses blindsight out to 60 feet, allowing it to detect creatures even when blind.
skills: Has a perception skill of +2, making it reasonably aware of hidden threats.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and not affected by the poisoned condition.
Can regenerate gut lassos on its turn, maintaining battlefield control.
Functions without air, food, drink, or sleep due to its undead nature.
test_queries: sinister undead monster with grappling abilities
grotesque creature using gut lassos to attack
undead that controls foes with grappling tactics
relentless grappler that doesn't need food or sleep
